languages.text:
{n}Громогласно хохотнув, великан торжествующе ревет:{/n} "Вырвались смелые из плена презренных отродий!
Темного града темницы убогие в сраме пребудут.
Сага о славном побеге польется рекою
На пиру, где восславят могучего Волка и ловкого эттфатера!"

{n}With thunderous laughter, the giant warrior triumphantly roars:{/n}
"Broke free the bold
from captors grasping!
Dark City's feeble dungeons
eternally disgracing!
Flows now this saga
in the hall of glorious feasting
Where all extol the Wolf mighty
and the Aett-Vater cunning!"
languages.original_text:
{n}Громогласно хохотнув, великан торжествующе ревет:{/n} "Вырвались смелые из плена презренных отродий!

languages.text:
{n}Con risa atronadora, el enorme guerrero ruge triunfal:{/n}
«¡Una fuga audaz
de terribles captores!
¡Burlada por siempre, la Ciudad
Siniestra y sus horrores!
¡Fluye ahora esta saga
{mf|en un comedor impoluto|con comida casi disoluta},
en alabanza del poderoso Lobo
y de{mf|l aett-vater astuto| la aett-vater astuta}!».
languages.original_text:
{n}With thunderous laughter, the giant warrior triumphantly roars:{/n}
"Broke free the bold
from captors grasping!
Dark City's feeble dungeons
eternally disgracing!
Flows now this saga
in the hall of glorious feasting
Where all extol the Wolf mighty
and the Aett-Vater cunning!"

languages.text:
{n}伴随着雷鸣般的笑声，这位硕大的战士发出了胜利的咆哮。{/n}
“将勇敢的野狼，
从猎人中解救！
黑暗之城孱弱的地牢，
将会永远蒙羞！
如今这段史诗，
在辉煌的宴会大厅中传唱。
所有人都会歌颂野狼的强大，
和狼领的狡猾！”
languages.original_text:
{n}With thunderous laughter, the giant warrior triumphantly roars:{/n}
"Broke free the bold
from captors grasping!
Dark City's feeble dungeons
eternally disgracing!
Flows now this saga
in the hall of glorious feasting
Where all extol the Wolf mighty
and the Aett-Vater cunning!"

和狼领的狡猾！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}雷が轟くような大声で笑いながら、巨大な戦士は得意そうに咆哮する：{/n}
「捕獲者の手から
大胆さを奪い取れ！
仄暗き都のもろき地下牢
永遠の不名誉なり！
このサーガを今流す
栄光の饗宴のホールへ
誰もが強力なウルフと
狡猾なアエット＝ヴァテルを讃える場所！」
languages.original_text:
{n}With thunderous laughter, the giant warrior triumphantly roars:{/n}
"Broke free the bold
from captors grasping!
Dark City's feeble dungeons
eternally disgracing!
Flows now this saga
in the hall of glorious feasting
Where all extol the Wolf mighty
and the Aett-Vater cunning!"

languages.text:
{n}Partant d'un rire tonitruant, le guerrier géant rugit d'un air triomphant :{/n}
« Le brave a su échapper
à ses ravisseurs médusés !
Les piètres cachots de la Cité
à jamais s'en trouvent bafoués !
Tous chantent désormais sa saga
aux banquets des preux guerriers
Où l'on salue l'intrépide rescapé
et son aett-vater à l'esprit rusé ! »
languages.original_text:
{n}With thunderous laughter, the giant warrior triumphantly roars:{/n}
"Broke free the bold
from captors grasping!
Dark City's feeble dungeons
eternally disgracing!
Flows now this saga
in the hall of glorious feasting
Where all extol the Wolf mighty
and the Aett-Vater cunning!"

languages.text:
{n}Mit einem donnerndem Lachen brüllt der riesige Krieger triumphierend:{/n}
"Befreit den Kühnen
aus der Gefangenschaft!
Schwache Verliese der Dunklen Stadt
zur ewigen Schande gereichen!
Fließt nun diese Saga
in den Hallen des glorreichen Gelages,
wo alle den mächtigen Wolf preisen
und den listigen Aett-Vater!"
languages.original_text:
{n}With thunderous laughter, the giant warrior triumphantly roars:{/n}
"Broke free the bold

Where all extol the Wolf mighty
and the Aett-Vater cunning!"

languages.text:
{n}Devasa savaşçı, gürleyen bir kahkahayla zafer kazanmışçasına kükrüyor.{/n}
"Tutsak edenlerin elinden
Cesur kurtuldu bile!
Kara Şehir'in âciz zindanları
Soyuma küfür okur!
Şimdi bu destan duyulsun
Ziyafet çekilen şanlı salonlarda!
Güçlü kurt ve kurnaz Aett-Vater
Herkesin övgüsüne nail olsun!"
languages.original_text:
{n}With thunderous laughter, the giant warrior triumphantly roars:{/n}
"Broke free the bold
from captors grasping!
Dark City's feeble dungeons
eternally disgracing!
Flows now this saga
in the hall of glorious feasting
Where all extol the Wolf mighty
and the Aett-Vater cunning!"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Devasa savaşçı, gürleyen bir kahkahayla zafer kazanmışcasına kükrüyor.{/n}
"Tutsak edenlerin elinden
kurtuldu bile cesur!
Kara Şehir'in âciz zindanları
soyuma küfür okur!
Şimdi bu destan duyulur
ziyafet çekilen şanlı salonlarda!
Övgüler yağdırsın herkes
güçlü Kurt ve kurnaz Aett-Vater'a!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
